alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Addison; Western Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 12 at 9:50AM EST until January 13 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 65 to 70 mph expected. Locally higher gusts possible along the western slopes of the Green Mountains, including near the city of Rutland. * WHERE...Orleans, Lamoille, Western Addison, Western Rutland, Eastern Franklin, Eastern Chittenden, Eastern Addison and Eastern Rutland Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Scattered to widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Period of strongest winds is expected to be between midnight and 9 AM on Saturday. In addition, given that property and vegetation were impacted by a high wind event just 72 hours prior, the threshold for damages may be lower with this event.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Rutland; Lamoille; Orleans; Western Addison; Western Rutland
